attributes.action: Introduce "On The Spot Fines" For Any Cyclist Caught Using I-Pod/Mp3 Player
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This practice of using an I-Pod/MP3 Player, is an extremely dangerous thing to do, with sound turned up loud, makes them totally oblivious to motorists, and of course if in collision with a car, it is always the motorist to blaim.
